notes: mutation_type uses full type names (e.g., 'Insertion - In frame', 'Substitution - Missense')
mutation_type_group is NOT a query parameter - it's only available in the response
To filter by mutation_type_group, fetch data first then use JN filters
limit parameter may be ignored by the API - use JQ limit() filter for guaranteed limiting
examples: jn cat @genomoncology/alterations -p gene=EGFR | jn filter '@genomoncology/extract-alterations' | jn filter 'select(.mutation_type_group == "Insertion")'
